form.text: COI established Sertec with Xiamen Information Investment Co., Ltd. in 2010, by investing NT$14 million
cash and held 49% ownership of Sertec. Sertec engages mainly in customer service and platform rental
Tatung Technology Inc. and Panda Monium Company Ltd. are the equity method investees of Chunghwa
Investment Co., Ltd. They engage mainly in selling the products of SET TOP BOX and making animations,
The equity in earnings for the years ended December 31, 2009 and 2010 are based on the audited financial
Industrial Bank of Taiwan II Venture Capital Co.,
Ultra Fine Optical Technology Co., Ltd.
